item.title: CSS Battle #1 Writeup: Learning CSS
item.description: You might be asking yourself how did you get here? I know I’m sort of asking myself the same question: the TL;DR is I never stop learning, and right now I needed to learn some CSS for my job. I’ve started learning CSS for real at work recently to be able to do full-stack E2E development. So far, CSS was a “hack it until it works” kind of thing for me, and I’ve never done it properly.
